mapper.insert: insert into CLUBBOARD_REPLY (rno, cbBno, reply, replyer, cbNum) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{cbBno},#{reply},#{replyer},#{cbNum})
mapper.update: update CLUBBOARD_REPLY set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from CLUBBOARD_REPLY where cbBno = #{cbBno} order by rno desc
